title: A Pedestal Not Unlike the Attic I Planned
description: The works in the Pedestal Series point attention to the crossovers between gallery and home – between means of display and methods of storage. They are objects whose function is compromised by their hybridization and another means by which I explore and experience the push of the professional and the pull of the domestic. This one mimics the remodeling of my attic that was never completed.
